oai_dc:dc.dc:title: UIMA/U-Compare OpenNLP Tokenizer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a UIMA wrapper for the OpenNLP Tokenizer tool. It splits English sentences into individual tokens. The tool forms part of the in-built library of components provided with the U-Compare platform (see separate META-SHARE record) for building and evaluating text mining workflows. The U-Compare Workbench (see separate META-SHARE record), provides a graphical drag-and drop interface for the rapid creation of workflows.
